verses.verse: By the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, there we sat <S%H3427>down<s%>, <S%H1058>Yes<s%>, we wept, when we <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
We <S%H8518>hung<s%> our <S%H3658>harps<s%> upon the <S%H6155>willows<s%> in the middle <S%H8432>there<s%>.

For there they that carried us away <S%H7617>captive<s%> <S%H7592>required<s%> of us a <S%H1697>song<s%>; and they that <S%H8437>wasted<s%> us required of us <S%H8057>mirth<s%>, <S%H7891>saying<s%>, Sing us one of the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
How shall we <S%H7891>sing<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H7892>song<s%> in a <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>?
If I <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3389>you<s%>, O Jerusalem, let my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> forget her <S%H7911>skill<s%>.

If I do not <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3956>you<s%>, let my tongue <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to the roof of my <S%H2441>mouth<s%>; if I <S%H5927>prefer<s%> not <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> above my <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; who <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6168>Raze<s%> <S%H6168>it<s%>, raze <S%H3247>it<s%>, even to the foundation there.
O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, who are to be <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>; <S%H835>happy<s%> shall he <S%H7999>be<s%>, that rewards you as you have served <S%H1580>us<s%>.
<S%H835>Happy<s%> shall he <S%H270>be<s%>, that takes and <S%H5310>dashes<s%> your little <S%H5768>ones<s%> against the <S%H5553>stones<s%>.
